CRYPTO MARKET UPDATE - JAN 24, 2026   The crypto market continues consolidating with total market cap at 3.02T (-0.28%) while 24h volume jumped 6.83% to $105.25B.    $BTC  BTC remains stuck in the $88K-$90K range for over a week, unable to break resistance. RSI at 33 suggests oversold conditions, but the Sharpe ratio turned negative while volatility isn't justifying returns.   Whale wallets accumulated 3K $BTC  BTC in 24h, showing institutional interest despite choppy price action.    $ETH   hit hardest, dropping 6%+ in 24h below $3K as it struggles to maintain momentum.    Market Sentiment:Fear & Greed Index at 28 (fear territory). BTC dominance sits at 59.22%, reflecting capital concentration in the market leader.   Altcoin Season Index at 37, well below the 75 threshold needed for sustained alt rallies.    Brief Relief: Suspected BoJ intervention Friday pushed BTC briefly to $91K. Miner stocks rebounded 5-10%.    Key Levels: Watch $90K-$91K resistance for BTC. Loss of $87.5K support could open path to $85K.   Bottom Line: Market in wait and see mode. Patience over FOMO. Next major move likely hinges on macro catalysts and regulatory developments.   Volume: $105.25B | DOM: 59.22% |  F&G: 28   #BTC Price Analysis#  #Macro Insights#  #Altcoin Season#  #XRP

$ETH  ETH Burned The more Ethereum is used... The more ETH is burned

Vitalik Buterin just dropped a rare but sharp critique of crypto culture. His core message: being open doesn‚Äôt mean cheering everything that pumps price or attention - and that mindset can quietly damage the industry long term, including how people think about $BTC  .  He pointed to Terra‚Äôs Luna collapse, saying it wasn‚Äôt built on $ETH   ‚Äúby accident.‚Äù In his view, culture matters. Open systems can‚Äôt stop every bad actor, but communities still choose what they normalize - and blindly backing powerful figures or projects creates reputational risk.  Vitalik also took aim at Bitcoin maximalism, criticizing forced adoption narratives like El Salvador‚Äôs. When adoption ignores personal freedom and democracy, he warned, it becomes fragile. Price might go up - but trust doesn‚Äôt always follow.  #ETH  #BTC Price Analysis#  #Bitcoin Price Prediction: What is Bitcoins next move?#

Quantum Apocalypse Is Closer Than You Think ‚Äî Ethereum‚Äôs Already on High Alert. Are You?   Forget ‚Äúsomeday later.‚Äù #Quantum   computers aren‚Äôt sci-fi‚Äîthey‚Äôre a real threat that could retroactively crack your wallet keys. Yes, really: attackers can already be harvesting encrypted transactions today to decrypt them later once quantum machines become powerful enough. And if you think we‚Äôve got 20 years before that happens‚Äîthink again. Some experts put the deadline as early as 2028‚Äì2030.   The Ethereum Foundation gets it‚Äîand they‚Äôre acting fast. They‚Äôve just launched a full-fledged Post-Quantum (PQ) team led by Thomas Koratger and Emil from leanVM. Justin Drake put it bluntly: ‚ÄúTime to go full PQ.‚Äù This isn‚Äôt just academic research‚Äîit‚Äôs an engineering race. $1M bounties are already live for hardening hash functions like Poseidon. Earlier, EF poured $12M into zk-STARKs‚Äîquantum-resistant tech at its core.   They‚Äôre not waiting for disaster‚Äîthey‚Äôre building the bridge before the river floods. Multi-client testnets, emergency dev calls, AI-assisted formal verification of crypto primitives‚Äîit‚Äôs all happening now. They‚Äôre even hosting PQ workshops in Cannes this March 2026.   So here‚Äôs my question to you, as a trader and holder: if Ethereum is already locking down its defenses against the quantum future‚Ä¶ why are you still holding assets without factoring in this risk?  $ETH  #ETH  #Ethereum  #AI

Trump warned Canada of 100% U.S. tariffs if it deepens trade ties with China, citing economic and national security risks. Despite the geopolitical tension, the crypto market reacted mildly. $BTC   held near $89K, $ETH   stayed around $2.9K, and major altcoins showed mixed, mostly flat movement.   The muted response suggests traders see the comments as policy rhetoric rather than an immediate shock, while markets continue to balance trade risks against liquidity and regulatory uncertainty. $ETH  The problem of data access is a real sore spot that people prefer to keep quiet about.  - However, out of sight, independent validators temporarily lost a—Åcess to key transactional inform–∞tion. Within hours, only a narrow, centralized circle could reconstruct the network's timeline, while most users didn't notice anything until withdrawals, audits, or drainer checks suddenly began to fail.   However, out of sight, ind–µpendent validators temporarily lost access to k–µy trasnactional inform–∞tion. Within hours, only a narrow, centralized circle could reconstruct the network's timeline, while most users didn't notice anything until withdrawals, audits, or rugpull checks suddenly began to fail. This moment highlighted a harsh reality. The scaling probl–µm didn't arise because operations were slowing down. It was because no one could confirm what had happened with certainty. The network continued to evolve, but its past was becoming obs—Åure, expensive, or unavailable for verification. So the true obstacle was not bandwidth, but data availability. For experienced participants and DAOs, this is especially painful. You probably relied on L2, believing it to be akin to #Ethereum  , only faster. Instead, you've bec–æme dependent on an unr–µli–∞ble data #chain  —Åontrolled by sequencers, stor–∞ge tiers, and incentives that imperceptibly fail. also, data availability (DA) failures d–æn't manifest thems–µlv–µs spectacularly. First, transparency disap—Äears, then security assurances collapse, –∞nd trust is re—Älaced by the need to rely on someone else. scaling has created a paradox. Everyone wanted massive bandwidth, but no on–µ wanted to store, s—Énchronize, or d–æwnload enormous amounts of information. https://transscreen.ru/en/news29451

$ETH   is showing signs of strength after a recent pullback, currently trading around $2,951. Price action is consolidating above a rising trendline, and the structure suggests potential for a bullish continuation if key levels are reclaimed.  Technical Breakdown Trend: Short-term uptrend intact, supported by ascending trendline from recent lows. WYCKOFF ALPHA: Is $ETH Priming for a Breakout to $5K?


The current market structure for $ETH is showing a textbook Wyckoff accumulation pattern. This is a classic signal of institutional position-building, where large players absorb supply from the market before a major price expansion.


We may have just printed a critical "Last Point of Support" (LPS), which often precedes the markup phase. The trigger to watch is a "Sign of Strength" (SOS) breakout. A clean break above near-term resistance would confirm this entire structure and could ignite a powerful rally.


Verdict: Bullish. If this accumulation plays out, the next logical target for $ETH is the $5K+ level.
